title: How to Make Vanilla Pudding Strawberry Shortcake

steps.headline: Prepare the cake mix, following the box directions.
steps.description: Use greased cupcake/muffin tins (or use cupcake wrappers). Fill each one about 2/3 full. Bake for the time that it states on the box. When the cupcakes are done, place them on a rack for them to cool.

steps.headline: Mix the vanilla pudding mixes and cold milk in a bowl.
steps.description: Whisk the mixture for 2 minutes. Place the bowl in the refrigerator for at least 5 to 10 minutes or until you're ready to use it.

steps.headline: Cut the stems off of the strawberries and cut each strawberry into thin slices.
Prepare your dessert in two versions:
steps.description: Bowl: Put one cupcake in the center of the bowl. Cover it with 2 small spoonfuls of vanilla pudding. Surround the vanilla pudding with about 6 strawberry pieces on the side. Layer and cover the entire thing with whipped cream. Place about 5-6 strawberry pieces on the top. 16 ounce cup: Put one cupcake on the bottom. Cover it with 2 small spoonfuls of vanilla pudding. Layer the pudding with about 5-6 strawberry pieces. Cover with whipped cream. Place another cupcake on top of the whipped cream. Put another layer of vanilla pudding. Follow it with whipped cream. Decorate the top with 6 pieces of strawberries.

text: Pre-heat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Prepare the cake mix, following the box directions. Use greased cupcake/muffin tins (or use cupcake wrappers). Fill each one about 2/3 full. Bake for the time that it states on the box. When the cupcakes are done, place them on a rack for them to cool. Mix the vanilla pudding mixes and cold milk in a bowl. Whisk the mixture for 2 minutes. Place the bowl in the refrigerator for at least 5 to 10 minutes or until you're ready to use it. Cut the stems off of the strawberries and cut each strawberry into thin slices.  Prepare your dessert in two versions: Bowl: Put one cupcake in the center of the bowl. Cover it with 2 small spoonfuls of vanilla pudding. Surround the vanilla pudding with about 6 strawberry pieces on the side. Layer and cover the entire thing with whipped cream. Place about 5-6 strawberry pieces on the top. 16 ounce cup: Put one cupcake on the bottom. Cover it with 2 small spoonfuls of vanilla pudding. Layer the pudding with about 5-6 strawberry pieces. Cover with whipped cream. Place another cupcake on top of the whipped cream. Put another layer of vanilla pudding. Follow it with whipped cream. Decorate the top with 6 pieces of strawberries.
